summary:
My towering personal Player Home.
M7 2012.  Near Dawnstar.
descriptionHtml:
While walking along the path to Dawnstar, in the freezing blizzard, an adventurer discovered Icy Towers and decided to move in... The adventurer was welcomed by Amber the Cook and managed to trade some of his treasures there before slaying the dragon sleeping on the second tower.  \"This place is ideal,\" he thought to himself.  \"I finally have enough room to consolidate my blacksmithing business.\"  The adventurer realized his former home in Whiterun was too small, but until companions are allowed inside, he would use Icy Towers as a vacation home... 


My towering personal Player Home.
M7 2012.  Near Dawnstar.

- 4 levels and 11+ rooms.
- Plenty of storage space.
- Some Navmeshing (on to-do list)
- Overlooks Dawnstar.
- Includes Cook NPC (vendor)
- Heated Pool and Boiler Room (for logical reasons)
- No cheats
- Some marked respawn chests
- Designed for one player use (no companions yet)
- Created on June 10, 2012 by M7.

M7 

1.20:

- fixed Navmesh
- added items to NPC Vendor
- Added a Secret Den (in Master Bedchamber)
- Added All Tomes to Den
- See Dragon perch on 1st tower?

1.21:

- added Smelter to Cellar
- Game Tested
- added items to Cellar for Blacksmithing (respawn/RS barrel)


M7

M7
